metadata.title: CVE-2024-46478 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
HTMLDOC v1.9.18 contains a buffer overflow in parse_prefunction,ps-pdf.cxx:5681.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-46478` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

htmldoc - 1.9.2-1ubuntu0.2+esm2
htmldoc-common - 1.9.2-1ubuntu0.2+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: htmldoc package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.2-1ubuntu0.2+esm2').
